Class Summary
EnvironmentFactory  
ServiceProviderEngine In the example, this code uses the Environment object, which sometimes will be from Tenant1, and other times from Tenant2.
TenantLocatorGenerator This is the class that creates the service locator for each known tenant
TenantManager This class manages all information about all tenants, and also keeps track of the currently active tenant.

Annotation Types Summary
